verbs.description: [ARG0: A coalition of 20 state attorneys general] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [V: called] [ARG1: for an end to the Trump administration “ inhumane ” policy of forcibly separating children from their parents at the nation ’s southern border] .

A coalition of 20 state attorneys general Tuesday called for an end to the Trump administration “ inhumane ” policy of [ARGM-MNR: forcibly] [V: separating] [ARG1: children] [ARG2: from their parents] [ARGM-LOC: at the nation ’s southern border] .
